content: sweet crochet heart bracelet - string of hearts bracelet is a quick crochet pattern you can make one in no time as a gift to others or make one for yourself to wear on a special day the bracelet has an adjustable closure so it fits any wrist you can also adjust the number of hearts on the bracelet each heart measures 2 x 2 cm i used rico design essential no 10 cotton thread and 2 mm crochet hook you will only need a little amount the pattern is written in us crochet terms and has a crochet chart for the heart
